title: TruRoots Organic Sprouted Quinoa, 12 Ounces, Certified USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified
features: Contains 1- 12 Ounce Bag of truRoots Organic Sprouted Quinoa
Quick, easy to prepare sprouted quinoa that has the versatility you need for creative meals

description: Every bite of truRoots Organic Sprouted Quinoa is bursting with wholesome flavor. This tiny seed is moist, fluffy, and delicately sweet. Add it to stews, curries, casseroles, and soups. truRoots products are grown with care. Our organic farmers support our sustainability mission while growing the delicious ancient grains you crave. Our sprouted quinoa is USDA Organic and Non-GMO Project Verified, with 9g of protein and 3g of fiber in each serving. Create a delicious orange mango quinoa with truRoots Organic Sprouted Quinoa that the whole family will love.
